editorialNotes.standard: Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm, and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-traveling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp enemies without paying a dime or buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

editorialNotes.standard: It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.

name: Level Devil - NOT A Troll Game

editorialNotes.standard: This parkour-packed take on the beloved adventure franchise is bursting with fast-paced combat, gorgeous visuals, and a deep dive into Persian mythology.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Daredevil. Storm. Juggernaut. Vision. Kabam’s beautiful brawler gives you control of dozens of beloved heroes and villains as you punch, kick, and blast your way across the Marvel universe. A simple and intuitive set of attacks, counters, and special attacks make for edge-of-your-seat combat, but you’ll spend just as much time finding and upgrading your super-team. Figuring out the best way to use them is key to surviving bouts with relentless opponents—and progressing through treacherous story quests.

editorialNotes.tagline: In your world, you are the hero

editorialNotes.standard: Elemental magic rules the land of Teyvat in the remarkable Genshin Impact—and as a powerful Traveler, you put this power to good use. Vibrant visual effects transform elemental blasts of fire, ice, and lightning into jaw-dropping spectacles. But it’s not just a looker: Genshin Impact’s beautiful open world is filled with thrilling quests and fascinating secrets. Climb mountains, cook meals, and soar through the skies as you search for your lost sibling—or simply get lost in Teyvat and see what happens.
editorialNotes.short: Explore a new land, and meet amazing new characters.

editorialNotes.standard: Hit the slopes! Ski and snowboard through an action-packed sequel featuring bigger jumps, huge resorts, and a gorgeous open world.
Few villains are as unsettling as this stealth game's creepy neighbor, who relentlessly pursues you through his increasingly bizarre house.

Deciphering this game is no easy task—it feels like a metaphor. Is it a commentary on the fragile nature of trust and human connection? A scathing critique of our blind adherence to authority? Or is it just really weird? Regardless, INSIDE is an incredible journey with increasingly bizarre encounters that mix action with clever puzzle designs. The game isn’t meant to be entirely understood. It’s meant to be experienced.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Romance, mystery and home decor - this adventure has it all!

ios.subtitle: Spin the Wheel & Reel in Coins

editorialNotes.standard: Star Wars and toys go together like Wookiees and smugglers, but rarely so well as they do in these classic LEGO adventures. They’re all here—the most beloved characters, settings, and vehicles from the first six films, lovingly translated into plastic bricks for a wacky reenactment of George Lucas’s epic space odyssey. Thanks to instantly accessible controls and hours of action-packed gameplay, fans of all ages can jump in and relive their favorite scenes.
Crack the case of a missing teenager using clues hidden in her phone in this suspenseful mystery.
Explore a fascinating puzzle world rendered in a striking sketchbook style.
In this gruesome 2D platformer, you’re the monster! Grow your creepy blob by breaking through doors and snacking on evil scientists.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: We’ll be fossilized before we get through all the content packed into this impressive mobile version of the dino-taming survival favorite.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Liberty City Stories shows off one of gaming’s most memorable worlds while taking you on an action-packed tour of a criminal underworld. Stealing cars, evading cops, and racing through streets littered with obstacles is an absolute blast. Gaining notoriety while amassing new cars and weapons is as addictive as ever, and the franchise’s familiar dark humor had us laughing out loud. Rockstar's enormous game offers a wonderful sandbox filled with chaos and silliness, and you won’t want to leave it.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Rec Room is a sprawling, vibrant universe of wildly different multiplayer experiences, which makes it easy to find whatever we’re in the mood for. We can play paintball, slay monsters in dungeons, or simply hang out with friends on a moonlit island beach—and so much more. But it’s not all about playing: Rec Room lets us make things too. With intuitive tools for creating and sharing our own experiences, Rec Room provides a fantastic way to turn imagination into digital reality.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: 3d kid life in cute mine game

editorialNotes.tagline: Evolve your dinos in lush landscapes
editorialNotes.standard: This breathtaking game mixes tycoon-style park management with electrifying dino-on-dino battles, starring characters and critters from the blockbuster movie. We love tinkering with our dinosaur DNA to evolve our thunder lizards into more powerful specimens while also expanding our dream park’s high-tech facilities. When it comes time to test your dinosaurs’ mettle in the arena, strength and strategy are the keys to prehistoric pugilist victories. And luckily, the Indominus rex stays inside her cage. For now.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: The zoo animals went wild. Compete in action-packed online battles.

editorialNotes.standard: Although this game has a totally different visual style, it feels exactly like Rick and Morty—thanks to the same hilarious writing that’s made the Adult Swim series so popular. As you navigate the characters’ ridiculous worlds, your job is to collect and fight dozens of Mortys from parallel universes. You’ll find yourself laughing out loud yet constantly captivated by the gameplay. Even if you don’t know a schmeckle from a Meseeks, you’ll delight in the unconventional humor and gripping turn-based combat.
